sentences.en: But I am trying to find a balance between insistence and compromise.
sentences.cn: 我正努力在执着与妥协之间找到平衡点.

sentences.en: Gorbachev's repeated insistence that the " blank pages " of Soviet history must be filled in.
sentences.cn: 戈尔巴乔夫不断地坚持必须填写苏联历史的空白页.

sentences.en: He admired your insistence on understanding things and making your point, even when he preferred his own.
sentences.cn: 他敬佩你弄清楚问题、说服别人接受你的主张的那份坚持，即便有时他更倾向于自己的见解。

sentences.en: He could not understand her unreasonable insistence.
sentences.cn: 他实在弄不懂她为什么要这样无理取闹,坚持己见.

sentences.en: Her parents were united in their insistence that she go to college.
sentences.cn: 她的父母亲一致坚持认为她应该上大学.

sentences.en: Her parents were united in their insistence that she should go to college.
sentences.cn: 她的父母亲一致坚持认为她应该上大学。

sentences.en: His insistence upon precision of language is apt to seem fussy.
sentences.cn: 他斤斤计较文字的精确性,有时到了小题大作的程度.

sentences.en: His insistence upon strict obedience is correct.
sentences.cn: 他坚持绝对服从是对的.

sentences.en: Rigid insistence on the legislative specification of detailed standards is thought to be unsound and unworkable.
sentences.cn: 僵硬地坚持对详尽的标准要有立法说明,这一主张被认为是不合理和不切实际的.

sentences.en: She looked a little bored by his insistence.
sentences.cn: 她看上去有点为他的固执而不耐烦了.

sentences.en: The union has dropped its earlier insistence that workers should receive bonus payments.
sentences.cn: 工会起先坚持工人应当得到奖金,但是现在已经不再坚持了.

sentences.en: their insistence on strict standards of behaviour
sentences.cn: 他们对严格行为规范的坚决主张

sentences.en: Then our hosts attempted to get around my insistence to Dobryninn.
sentences.cn: 然后他们又企图抛开我曾对多勃雷宁坚持过的话.

sentences.en: They were united in their insistence that she should go to college.
sentences.cn: 他们一致坚持她应上大学.

sentences.en: We resent your insistence that the debt ( should ) be paid at once.
sentences.cn: 我们对你执意让人立即偿还债款的要求感到气恼.
